---
title: "data type exploration"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}

vec1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)

class(vec1)

typeof(vec1)

vec1_e3<- vec1[3]

vec1_e1 <- vec1[1]

vec1_e5to7 <- vec1[5:7]

vec1_char <- as.character(vec1)

vec1_char # everything is in quotes- indicates character

```

```{r}
vec2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", 
          location = "Rincon", 
          swell = "south")
vec2

class(vec2)# character
length(vec2) #is 3
vec2_e2 <- vec2[2]

```

```{r}
df1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "A", "D"), species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray wale"), 
count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))
df1
class(df1)
class(df1$species)
max_count <- max(df1$count)
```
